question:
Ini tas baruku. Warnanya hitam. Itu terbuat dari kain yang kuat. Ini cukup besar dan luas. Bisa    berisi semua hal sekolah saya. Tas ini murah. Harganya hanya Rp 300.000
Sebuah. Berapa ukuran tasnya?
b. Ini dapat berisi semua hal sekolah saya. Kata "itu" mengacu pada?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. ukuran tasnya besar dan luas

b. kata "itu" mengacu pada "tas"

related_questions.question:
Write down the generic structure of the text about!

bantuin woi​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Generic Structure of Descriptive Text : Identification, Description

Penjelasan:

# Identification: (contains about the introduction of a person, place, animal or object will be described.)

# Description: contains a description of something such as animal, things, place or person by describing its features, forms, colors, or anything related to what the writer describe.

Jawaban:

Orientation

A mobile phone - portable radio telephone

Event

The first mobile phone - in japan

General classification

A cell phone combines - wireless communication

Description

Paragraph 2-3 is a descriptiom about phone

related_questions.question: 3. What is the purpose of retelling a narrative, please explain?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The importance of retelling stories is that it allows students to learn to organize and describe events, which enhances reading comprehension.

related_questions.question:
Read the text and answer questions 6 to 8    It's nice Sunday morning. Hasan's family is doing separate activities. Mr. and Mrs. Hasan are on their bicycles. They
are going to the market groceries Rama the oldest son, is playing guitar in the backyard. The twin daughters, Ami and Irma
are reading a book together in the backyard at the same place the youngest daughter Mona, is drinking a glass of milk.
6.
What are Mr. and Mrs. hasan doing?
A. They are in their backyard
B. They are going to the market
C. They are going to the office
D. They are keeping their child's
7.
8.
What is the twin doing?
A. they are going to the market
B. they are playing guitar
C. they are reading a book together
D. they are drinking a glass of milk
Who is playing a guitar?
A. Hasan's family
B. Mona's Brother
C. Mona's Sister
D. Mona's parent​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6. B. They are going to the market

7. C. they are reading a book together

8. B. Mona's brother

Penjelasan:

Semoga bermanfaat!

Jawaban:

No. 6 : B.

No. 7 : C.

No. 8 : A.

Penjelasan:

Maaf kak klo ada yang salah

related_questions.question:
27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

See you at the next answer

Pawuuu
